title: What do I do?
content: I'm a hobbyist web developer focused on Front-End technology like ReactJS. But, I also dabble in other technologies & languages from time-to-time.

title: Where am I?
content: I currently live in 'the fine city' of Norwich in the East of England.

title: Am I just a dev?
content: No! I also love to do other things like blog and make tutorials to help others in their dev journey!

title: Coffee?
content: Of course! What dev is a dev now days without being 90% coffee.

title: What else do I enjoy?
content: Loads of things, I'm a keen motorbiker, gamer and movie lover when I have spare time!
